Objectives : 1 ) To assess health value veterans non-veterans HIV/AIDS ; 2 ) To characterize spirituality patient HIV/AIDS ; 3 ) To derive power function relate health rating utility ; 4 ) To assess whether society assign high value health state veteran non-veterans . Methods : We interview 100 representative veteran HIV/AIDS Cincinnati Pittsburgh VAMCs , concurrently , 350 non-veterans HIV/AIDS Cincinnati Washington , DC , twice 12-18 month . The patient questionnaire include clinical demographic data ; health value measure ; question compare life life infect HIV ; measure health status/health concern , HIV symptom , depressive symptom , spirituality/religion , adherence , social support , self-esteem , optimism .
